blocks.text: We desire to evaluate the integrals

blocks.latex: \int \sin 0 \cos 0 \, d\theta = \theta \text{  (since  } 0 \text{  and  } 0 \text{  are only positive values)}.
blocks.description: The integral of sine and cosine at zero.

blocks.text: from which the pair of results will express the result of great usefulness.

blocks.description: An example of integrating a cosine function.

blocks.text: By the process of reduction of powers we may express the integral to be evaluated in such a way that it depends on results (2), (3) or (5).
